mapper.insert:
INSERT IGNORE INTO hotel (id,brandName, businessDistrict,geoPointID,openingHours, commentCount,rating,tags, facilities,infrastructures, assistServices,city,description, price,level,minPrice, telephones,url,district, address,hasWifi,title, imageUrls,recommend,updatetime ) values
( #{hotelDes.id}, #{hotelDes.brandName}, #{hotelDes.businessDistrict}, (SELECT id FROM geopoint WHERE lon = ${hotelDes.geoPoint.lon} AND lat = ${hotelDes.geoPoint.lat}), #{hotelDes.openingHours}, #{hotelDes.commentCount}, #{hotelDes.rating}, #{hotelDes.tags}, #{hotelDes.facilities}, #{hotelDes.infrastructures}, #{hotelDes.assistServices}, #{hotelDes.city}, #{hotelDes.description}, #{hotelDes.price}, #{hotelDes.level}, #{hotelDes.minPrice}, #{hotelDes.telephones}, #{hotelDes.url}, #{hotelDes.district}, #{hotelDes.address}, #{hotelDes.hasWifi}, #{hotelDes.title}, #{hotelDes.imageUrls}, #{hotelDes.recommend}, #{hotelDes.updatetime} )
mapper.select: select id, imageUrls, title, rating, facilities, infrastructures, goodTagDist, assistServices, price, minPrice, description, city, district from hotel where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update hotel SET title=#{title}, brandName=#{brandName}, updatetime=#{updatetime}, businessDistrict=#{businessDistrict}, city=#{city}, district=#{district}, minPrice=#{minPrice}, openingHours=#{openingHours}, description=#{description}, address=#{address}, recommend=#{recommend} where id = #{id}
